hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select log_info.log_id logId, log_info.number number, log_info.caption caption, CAST(DATE_FORMAT(log_info.create_time, "%Y年%m月%d日%H时%i分%S秒") AS CHAR) createTime, log_info.key_cause1 keyCause1, log_info.key_cause2 keyCause2, log_info.key_cause3 keyCause3, CAST(log_info.info as CHAR) info, log_info.type type, log_info.status status from log_info WHERE (? = '' or log_info.type = ?) AND log_info.create_time BETWEEN ? AND date_add(?, interval 1 day) AND UPPER(log_info.caption) like UPPER(?) ORDER BY log_info.create_time desc, log_info.caption asc
select count(*) RECORD_COUNT from log_info WHERE (? = '' or log_info.type = ?) AND log_info.create_time BETWEEN ? AND date_add(?, interval 1 day) AND UPPER(log_info.caption) like UPPER(?)
